FavBooks.Author: Norman Doidge
FavBooks.Summary: Explores the concept of neuroplasticity and its implications for personal growth and recovery.

FavBooks.Book Title: Mindset: The New Psychology of Success
FavBooks.Author: Carol S. Dweck
FavBooks.Summary: Examines the power of one's mindset in achieving goals and cultivating resilience..

FavBooks.Book Title: The Whole-Brain Child: 12 Revolutionary Strategies to Nurture Your Child's Developing Mind
FavBooks.Author: Daniel J. Siegel and Tina Payne Bryson
FavBooks.Summary: Offers practical guidance for parents to support their children's emotional and cognitive development

FavBooks.Author: Daniel Kahneman
FavBooks.Summary: Explores the two systems of thinking (intuitive vs. deliberate) and how they shape our judgments and decisions

FavBooks.Book Title: The Power of Habit: Why We Do What We Do in Life and Business
FavBooks.Author: Charles Duhigg
FavBooks.Summary: Investigates the science behind habits and provides strategies for creating positive change.
